channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: SocGen’s model says ‘yes, silver’s in a bubble’ but its analysts say ‘no’ it isn’t.
item.description: There are structural tailwinds favoring silver, plus potential export restrictions by the U.S. and China that could tighten the stretched physical mar...

item.title: Here's what investor Joe Terranova is selling before year-end
item.description: Joe Terranova said that he sold out of his position in gold following a dramatic overnight reversal in precious metals.

item.title: Nvidia quietly bought a competitor last week. Why analysts believe this could be big deal for the stock
item.description: Nvidia's $20 billion deal to buy Groq will help it compete with Google as its rival continues marketing its TPUs for large-scale AI projects, analysts...

item.title: I’m afraid my financial adviser will steal my money. I’ve read too many cautionary tales. How can I be sure?
item.description: “I am 66 years old and have been retired for about a year and a half.”

item.title: Kylie Jenner lists ‘modern fortress’ in swanky SoCal neighborhood for $48 million
item.description: Kylie Jenner is offloading her Los Angeles concrete megamansion for $48 million after finishing building her sprawling Hidden Hills property.

item.title: Retail investors have been shying away from 60/40 funds, says JPMorgan. What they're doing instead
item.description: Mom and pop investors seem to be turning away from multi-asset funds and opting for a do-it-yourself approach.

item.title: ‘Sparkle, color, and glitter’: See how Jonathan Scott and Zooey Deschanel decorated their $9.5 million L.A. home for the holidays
item.description: “Property Brothers” star Jonathan Scott and actress Zooey Deschanel, who got engaged in 2023, have decked the halls of their sprawling Los Angeles hom...

item.title: Tuesday's big stock stories: What’s likely to move the market in the next trading session
item.description: The major averages slid on Monday, with the S&P 500 posting back-to-back losses as investors sold tech names heading into the end of 2025.

item.title: ‘He has become hostile’: My mom is in her 80s and has dementia. My brother is blocking access.
item.description: “Can someone who has not been found legally incompetent, but who has a history of delusions, make decisions regarding property?”

item.title: This real estate stock is well positioned heading into 2026, says Katie Stockton
item.description: Katie Stockton goes through the charts of this REIT.
